text: Great spot for affordable and delicious local dishes! The laksa was rich and flavorful, and the braised pork rice was packed with toppings. I also enjoyed the suan cai vermicelli soup, though I would’ve liked it a bit more sour. Their hot coffee and iced teh were both excellent, and the free hot drinks were a nice touch. Cozy and clean environment with friendly service—perfect for any time of the day!
The laksa and braised pork rice here are absolutely delicious! They even offer free hot drinks, which is such a thoughtful touch. This cozy little shop is full of heart and truly worth a visit!
The grilled fish and laksa is delicious. They also provide free drinks if you dine in, so nice!!! The service is excellent and the price is very reasonable!

Li Jie’s restaurant is amazing! The food is delicious and the portions are generous — definitely great value for money. The service is also warm and friendly, making the whole dining experience very pleasant. Highly recommend this place!

Li Jie’s shop is truly a hidden gem! From the flavorful braised pork rice to the signature laska, every dish is rich and authentic. Their thoughtful Wednesday free Chwee Kueh and Thursday red/green bean soup giveaways are heartwarming. Clean environment, affordable prices, and home-style taste—highly recommended!
